phase.text: Ohhh, thank you! Hey - have you seen my assistants? Are they all right?

userResponse.option: Yes, I think everyone is safe! But not for long if we don't stop Lia from tampering with your machine!

phase.text: Oh nooooo! It is absolutely impossible to get into that chamber, I made it out of Ultra-Unbreakabilium! Our only hope is to somehow overheat the machine and destroy it!

userResponse.option: And how do you suggest we do that??

phase.text: Right. Think, brain, think! AHA! Got it! You can use the laser to shoot those boosters on the wall. The energy surge will overload the machine. First, you have to connect the generator to activate the laser.

userResponse.option: You're a true genius, Lab! Let's do this!

phase.text: Oooooh, well done! I've had trouble myself getting that bucket of bolts to work!

userResponse.option: No problem! It's what I've been trained to do!

phase.text: Go to the laser now! Aim carefully and shoot those boosters on the wall. Hit them when they're active and the green light is ON!

userResponse.option: Good thing I've been doing my target practice!

phase.text: Oh, one more wee word of advice. That machine? You'll have to overload ALL the boosters at once. If you miss any green lights, the system will repair itself and you'll have to start again. I built this thing well!
Don't worry my lab explodes all the time. Maybe I should invent a lab-rebuilding machine.
